title: Microscopic wonders in water
creator_credit: Pat Dowling, Boulton-Hawker Films and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: Introduces children to the fascinating world of water life seen through the microscope; shows the use of the microscope and how to prepare cultures. Examples seen include amoeba, vorticella, stentor, urocentrum, rotifer, hydra and the birth and development of a water snail.
